artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Blue dominates. Plain weave or Twill variation. Similar to Pomegranate. 2 blues olive warp. Med green, Bright green & metallic blue weft. Plain weave variation. Stapled to 8.5x1" card along with 99.1.1213.10, 11, & 13. "H-8b" written on card. Some notes on reverse. (blue, green)
